Entries.Good_0: Ah... it sure is good to know that I get to annoy you for the rest of my life.$6#$b#Have a good day, you dweeb. Love you.$6
Entries.Good_1: Have I ever told you that Jas thinks you're the coolest grown-up ever?$6#$b#Don't worry, I won't tell her what a huge dork you really are.$h
Entries.Good_2: Hey, I was thinking we should have Jas and Marnie over for lunch sometime. They'd like that, wouldn't they?$6#$e#I'll probably get Gus to make us something, though. I don't wanna take any chances with my cooking.
Entries.Good_3: Well, someone was really clingy last night... it took me a while to wiggle out of your grip so I could get to the bathroom.$6#$e#Hey, I'm not complaining. Not one bit.$h
Entries.Good_4: Hey, you know I love you, right?$l#$b#I just wanna make sure you never forget.$l
Entries.Good_5: I'm in a great mood today... The Tunnelers won big last night.$h
Entries.Good_6: Ah, don't kiss me. I haven't brushed my teeth yet and I don't wanna expose you to that.$6#$b#I've, uh, had some trouble getting myself to do anything this morning.$3
Entries.Good_7: Hey, sunshine. Could you stay with me for a little bit?#$b#Today feels really heavy...$s
Entries.Good_8: *Sniff*... *sniff*... mmm... what's that wonderful fragrance you're wearing? Eau de pepperoni?$6#$e#I'm kidding, I'm kidding.$h#$e#Seriously, though, do you smell pizza somewhere?
Entries.Good_9: If someone told me before we met that this is what my life would be like, I would've told them that they were wrong.#$b#I'm glad that *I* was wrong, though.$6
Entries.Neutral_0: Why don't you tell me about your day when we're in bed tonight? I'm kind of busy right now...
Entries.Neutral_1: Don't touch the sink, I'll do the dishes eventually. I just need time to psych myself up for it, okay?
Entries.Neutral_2: Ugh... clean, clean, clean. Sweep, sweep, sweep. Bathe. Cook. Make the bed... Oh, well. Life's alright.
Entries.Neutral_3: Hm... the door hinges are getting squeaky.$3#$b#*sigh* I guess I gotta deal with that later.
Entries.Neutral_4: Do you think your grandpa would be proud of the work we've done?
Entries.Neutral_5: Do you ever feel like there's a huge yawning chasm in your chest?#$b#Sometimes I wake up feeling so... hollow.$s#$e#*sigh*... I hate having days like these.
Entries.Neutral_6: Do you think I spend too much time in the house?#$e#Maybe I should get out more...$3#$b#Ugh, I'd really rather just stay in most of the time.
Entries.Neutral_7: Hm. I can't tell if my hair is turning gray, or if it's just a trick of the light.$3#$b#You'll still like me when I'm old for real, right?$6
Entries.Neutral_8: I wish Jas would come over more often...$3#$b#Well yeah, she comes over almost every day, but still.#$e#*sigh*... I sure am getting clingy.$6
Entries.Neutral_9: Sometimes I feel like I'm not doing enough to help you out...$3#$b#I'm trying my best though. You know that, right?#$e#I wish it weren't so hard for me to get stuff done.$3
Entries.Outdoor_0: I didn't sleep well last night, so I'm hoping this fresh air will get the juices flowing.#$e#What juices, you ask? Heh... you're weird.$h
Entries.Outdoor_1: Hey, @. You were sleeping like a baby, so I slipped out of bed and went for a morning walk around the farm. Everything looks fine.$6
Entries.Outdoor_2: I used to have plans of moving back to the city someday, but I've grown really attached to this place.$6#$e#Visiting Zuzu's still fun, but I can't really imagine living there anymore.$6
Entries.Outdoor_3: When I stop and think about it... I'm in a good place. My life is pretty nice.$6
Entries.Outdoor_4: I wonder what I'd be like if I grew up in this town.$3#$b#*sigh*... I really shouldn't dwell on 'what-ifs.'#$e#So, what are you up to today?$6
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Hey, chickadee. *yawn*#$b#I just got back from the ranch. Did I wake you up when I came in?#$b#Here, I brought you some breakfast.$6 [211]#$e#Marnie called me at three in the morning 'cause Jas woke up crying and looking for me.#$b#I'm starting to think I should take her to Zuzu with me when I go for my therapy sessions. Yoba knows she's been through a lot for a kid her age...$3#$e#I know it's kinda messed up, but part of me is really glad that she still looks for me when she has nightmares. The way I see it, it means she knows that she can count on me.$6#$e#*yawn* I think I'll go take a nap. Be careful out there, all right?$6
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Morning, @. Or should I call you 'filthy blanket hog?'#$e#It's fine. You're still cute, even if you do steal the sheets.$6
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Hey, @. I woke up at like three in the morning and couldn't go back to sleep, so I made some breakfast. [215 206]#$e#Sorry I didn't make real food... I'm feeling pretty off today.$3
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Buh... sometimes life feels like a slow, gray blur... know what I mean?#$e#...Maybe I should do something fun today.$3
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Hey, welcome to JojaMart.$6#$b#...$6#$b#...#$b#I can't believe I said that. Yoba, it's like they branded that onto my brain or something.$10
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Hey chickadee, are you free sometime this week? Marnie wants us to come over for dinner.#$e#I think she's planning on making it a taco night, so I'm pretty excited.$6
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: If... If only... ah, I was just thinking back on the glory days, when I played gridball on the varsity team.$6#$b#It's kinda wild how one mistake can end up changing your life forever.#$e#Anyway, why don't you tell me about your day?$6
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Buh... I couldn't get myself to do anything today.$s#$e#I tried to do some work, but then I lost focus and fell asleep.#$b#*sigh*$3
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Harvey and my therapist have been bugging me about keeping a consistent sleep schedule, so I've been going to bed at a fixed time.#$b#Falling asleep and staying that way is still kind of a problem, though.$s#$e#Well... I guess I should still give myself credit for following my schedule.$6
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Buh... I didn't do anything today, but I still feel exhausted.$s#$e#Sorry I couldn't get anything done.
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: The rain makes me feel so lazy...$3#$b#Do you have to go out today? We could just stay in bed till the rain stops...$6
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I'm gonna stay in today... the rain looks pretty bad out there.$3#$e#Wanna stay in with me? Or do you have stuff to do?#$b#All right, be careful out there.$6
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Hey, looks like you won't have to worry about watering the crops... why don't you take it easy today?$6
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Take this... [773]#$e#I know you like to head into the caves on days like this. Come home in one piece, @.
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: Heh, sorry I'm dripping all over the floor. I tried to go for a walk when it started pouring.$6#$e#I should probably start checking the weather forecast, but ehhh.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: ...#$b#...I'll never get used to seeing how good you look after a day of working outdoors.$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: *sigh*... You're gonna get yourself sick if you keep spending all day in the rain like that. Come on, let's get you into some dry clothes.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I just remembered some of the video projects I made back when I was in high school. I wonder if I can find the tapes...#$e#Do I wanna watch them? Fuck no. I wanna find the tapes so I can have the cows trample them before I put them in a box to throw into the bottom of a gorge.#$b#Ugh, those were so embarrassing...$3#$e#Well... I guess I could let you watch some of them if you really wanna.$6
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: Eat up, bugaboo.$6 [199 457 727]#$e#I know it's not Luau-level stuff, but you gotta warm up after spending all day in the rain.$6
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: *sigh*... I hope Jas doesn't get any nightmares tonight. The rain has a way of setting her off...$3#$e#I'm gonna give her a call. I'll join you in bed in a bit, bud.$6
